title: Living Statue

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with Overprotective defense.
- If someone attacks you, you lose a level of defense and gain a level of attack.
- You can visit yourself to erode yourself. If you erode yourself and someone attacks you, your self-erode will fail.
- It is assumed that the highest level attacker attacks first.
- If nobody visits you and you do not attack at night, you will gain a level of defense and lose a level of attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
